title: Putin says Moscow has deal with Belarus to station nuclear weapons there
description: Russia has struck a deal with neighboring Belarus to station tactical nuclear weapons on its territory, President Vladimir Putin said Saturday.

title: At least 23 dead, 4 missing, dozens injured after devastating tornadoes tear through Mississippi
description: Tornadoes swept through Mississippi Friday night, killing at least 23 people, 13 in Rolling Fork alone, the Mississippi Emergency Management Agency said.

title: From brain waves, this AI can sketch what you're picturing
description: Zijiao Chen can read your mind, with a little help from powerful artificial intelligence and an fMRI machine.

title: Awaiting possible indictment, Trump rallies in Waco
description: Donald Trump will hold his first major rally of his 2024 presidential campaign in Waco, Texas on Saturday - with possible indictment looming over him.

title: Defrocked Catholic priest accused of molesting a boy still runs charity for kids
description: A defrocked New York priest accused of sexual abuse continues to run a charity that could put him in contact with children, according to public records.

title: Why are some ADHD patients drug-tested while others are not?
description: Some adults who take prescription medication for attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder are required to have their urine tested for drugs several times a year.

title: At least 5 dead after tornado and damaging storms hit Mississippi
description: At least five people died after a tornado struck the Mississippi town of Rolling Fork, and other communities also experienced damage as storms swept through the state Friday, officials said.

title: 2 dead, 7 missing after explosion rocks Pennsylvania chocolate factory
description: Two people are dead and seven are missing after an explosion rocked a chocolate factory in Pennsylvania on Friday, authorities said.

title: After strike, Los Angeles school district and union reach deal
description: One day after a three-day strike that closed schools, the Los Angeles school district and a service workers union reached an agreement that the superintendent called “historic.”

title: Woman arrested in case of missing traveler found dead in rolled-up rug in Louisiana
description: A woman was arrested Friday in connection to the missing traveler who was found dead alongside a Louisiana highway earlier this month, Baton Rouge police said.

title: Ron DeSantis' donors and allies question if he's ready for 2024
description: Ron DeSantis may be missing his moment. A number of the Florida governor’s allies are worried his recent stumbles suggest he may not be ready for 2024.
